pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 17, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Gatineau, Quebec

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Diplomatic Corps Holiday Reception. Minister of Foreign Affairs François-Philippe Champagne will be in attendance.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

8:30 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Citytv’s Breakfast Television Toronto.

11:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CJMR 1320 AM’s Parvasi Radio.
